Associate Professor and Chair of the [Department of Information Science](https://www.dal.ca/faculty/management/faculty-staff/information-science.html) at [Dalhousie University](https://www.dal.ca/), Director of the [QSSLab](https://qsslab.github.io), Editor-in-Chief of [CJILS-RCSIB](https://www.erudit.org/en/journals/cjils/), and associate member of [CIRST](https://www.cirst.uqam.ca/en/).
